name: Entangled
description: Entangled is a physics puzzle game revolving around grappling gun mechanics. You are immersed in a colorful environment while being entranced by a relaxing space ambient soundtrack. It is challenging, but extremely rewarding.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 230 MB available space
